snippet: Egypt, coached by the former American coach Bob Bradley, failed to qualify for its second successive Africa Cup of Nations after a with the Central African Republic ensured that it missed out on aggregate.
lead_paragraph: Egypt, coached by the former American coach Bob Bradley, failed to qualify for its second successive Africa Cup of Nations after a with the Central African Republic ensured that it missed out on aggregate.

headline.seo: Bradley’s Egypt Fails to Qualify for Africa Cup of Nations
headline.main: Bradley’s Egypt Fails to Qualify for Africa Cup of Nations
